original_text: But if God decides to do nothing, no one can say that he is wrong. If he hides himself, no one can see him. But he still rules over people and over nations. But if God decides to do nothing, no one can say that he is wrong. If he hides himself, no one can see him. But he still rules over people and over nations. But if God decides to do nothing, no one can say that he is wrong. If he hides himself, no one can see him. But he still rules over people and over nations. But if God decides to do nothing,
korean_text: 주께서 침묵하신다고 누가 그를 정죄하며 그가 얼굴을 가리신다면 누가 그를 뵈올 수 있으랴 그는 민족에게나 인류에게나 동일하시니

sentences.original_text: But if God decides to do nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만약 하나님이 아무것도 하지 않기로 결정하시면

sentences.original_text: no one can say that he is wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그가 틀렸다고 말할 수 없습니다

no one can see him

and over nations
